title: Central African Republic bullish on crypto; unveils plans for crypto tax haven and crypto wallet
description:
The Central African Republic has unveiled plans for Sango, a crypto tax haven island, and a crypto wallet as a part of its plans to revamp the financial system of the country.

President Faustin-Archange Touadera of the Central African Republic (CAR) took to Twitter on May 24 to announce the launch ...
